title: Corrupted video recording from external camera
content:
I'm using an app called HfunPro to control a drone.  This has the capacity to take photos and record video from the drone camera.

Photos are fine and the live video feed displays without issue, but when videos a recorded they are corrupted, blocky, large grey artefacts etc.

I've tested on a Galaxy S7 running Android 8 and videos record without issue, so I know the drone camera is working fine.
